titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House from the legislative day of Thursday, July 1, 1993 to Tuesday, July 13, 1993 and an adjournment or recess of the Senate from Thursday, July 1, 1993 or Friday, July 2, 1993 until Tuesday, July 13, 1993.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 1, 1993, until July 13, 1993, and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from July 1 or 2, 1993, until July 13, 1993.
